text: Oh Davide! Ngempela thina sakwenza waba ngumholi emhlabeni ngakho-ke yehlulela phakathi kwabantu ngeqiniso futhi ungazilandeli izifiso zizokudukisa endleleni kaMvelinqangi, ngempela labo abadukayo endleleni kaMvelinqangi okwabo yisijeziso esinzima ngenxa yokuthi balikhohlwa usuku lokwahlulela
